column4: i am trying to upgrade my ubuntu and it is giving me an error saying i have conflicts and this is the output of my apt.log file but do not know how to fix it  http://paste.ubuntu.com/559728/
do you have an Nvidia driver installed that you got direct from the nvidia site?
i do not believe so, but i could be wrong is there a way to tell?
probably but I don't know the command.. hopefully someone else here will.
